languages.text: "О-о, задумали взять меня живым, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Кривая ухмылка раздирает рот хладного торговца, и он злобно хохочет.{/n} "Я бы на это посмотрел!"

traits.locale_text: "О-о, задумали взять меня живым, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Кривая ухмылка раздирает рот хладного торговца, и он злобно хохочет.{/n} "Я бы на это посмотрел!"
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
languages.original_text: "О-о, задумали взять меня живым, Ваша Светлость?" {n}Кривая ухмылка раздирает рот хладного торговца, и он злобно хохочет.{/n} "Я бы на это посмотрел!"

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
traits.speaker: Falco

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
traits.speaker: Falco

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
traits.speaker: Falco

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
traits.speaker: Falco

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: 「おっと、私を生きたまま連れて行くつもりですか、陛下？」{n}荒々しい笑いが闇商人の顔に広がり、彼は意地悪く笑う。{/n}「ぜひ挑戦するところを見たいものだ！」
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: 「おっと、私を生きたまま連れて行くつもりですか、陛下？」{n}荒々しい笑いが闇商人の顔に広がり、彼は意地悪く笑う。{/n}「ぜひ挑戦するところを見たいものだ！」
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: “噢噢，你以为你能活捉我吗，大人？”{n}法尔科脸上露出了狰狞的笑容，发出了充满恶意的笑声。{/n}“我倒是想看看你能不能做得到！”
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: “噢噢，你以为你能活捉我吗，大人？”{n}法尔科脸上露出了狰狞的笑容，发出了充满恶意的笑声。{/n}“我倒是想看看你能不能做得到！”
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: «Aah, ¿cree que me va a capturar con vida, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}La Comerciante Fría esboza una sonrisa desgarrada y profiere una carcajada maliciosa.{/n} «¡Eso ya lo veremos!».
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: «Aah, ¿cree que me va a capturar con vida, mi{mf|lord|lady}?». {n}La Comerciante Fría esboza una sonrisa desgarrada y profiere una carcajada maliciosa.{/n} «¡Eso ya lo veremos!».
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: « Oh, vous croyez que vous allez me prendre vivant, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}Un sourire effrayant se peint sur le visage du contrebandier avant de se transformer en un ricanement répugnant.{/n} « J'ai hâte de voir ça ! »
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, vous croyez que vous allez me prendre vivant, Votre Seigneurie ? »{n}Un sourire effrayant se peint sur le visage du contrebandier avant de se transformer en un ricanement répugnant.{/n} « J'ai hâte de voir ça ! »
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: "Ooh, Ihr denkt, Ihr kriegt mich lebend, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Ein verzerrtes Lächeln zerteilt das Gesicht des Kalthändlers, und er lacht bösartig.{/n} "Versucht es ruhig!"
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: "Ooh, Ihr denkt, Ihr kriegt mich lebend, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}?" {n}Ein verzerrtes Lächeln zerteilt das Gesicht des Kalthändlers, und er lacht bösartig.{/n} "Versucht es ruhig!"
traits.speaker: Falco

languages.text: "Ha! Beni canlı yakalayacağını mı sandın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri?" {n}Soğuk Tacir'in yüzüne tatsız bir gülümseme beliriyor, çirkince gülüyor.{/n} "Denesene!"
languages.original_text: "Ooh, think you're going to take me alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}?" {n}A ragged snarl of a smile splits the Cold Trader's face, and he laughs nastily.{/n} "I'd like to see you try!"

traits.locale_text: "Haa, beni canlı yakalayacağını mı sandın {mf|Lord|Leydi} hazretleri?" {n}Soğuk Tacir'in yüzüne tatsız bir gülümseme beliriyor ve çirkince gülüyor.{/n} "Dene de görelim!"
traits.speaker: Falco
